# PostgreSQL on the Desktop - single user

## Download the installer
1. Go to EnterpriseDB download site <https://www.enterprisedb.com/downloads/postgres-postgresql-downloads>.
2. Select the latest version (10.2)
3. Select your operating system (Windows, Mac or Linux - yes, it works on Linux)
